DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : JAPAN
DOC.TEXT: Industrial Production Figures Adjusted Upward : The Ministry of International Trade and Industry said industrial production rose slightly more in January than previous data indicated.The revision of production , shipments and inventory figures by the ministry adds weight to the view that Japan ' s economy is pulling_out of a long recession . Output at Japan ' s factories grew a revised 1.0 % in January , instead of the earlier estimate of 0.9 % , the ministry said . Production of machinery , particularly computers and semiconductors , boosted output , a ministry official said .
